_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four meditators [sn34.18:1.4]: One meditator who is skilled in entering immersion but not in practicing persistently for it
Another meditator who is skilled in persistently practicing for immersion but not in entering it
Another meditator who is unskilled in both entering immersion and persistently practicing for it
Another meditator who is skilled in both entering immersion and persistently practicing for it
